> when i use mysql 5.6 ,its the problem i have encounterd,you can upgrade mysql to 5.7 or set system global variables 'innodb_large_prefix' on,and SET GLOBAL innodb_file_format=Barracuda; SET GLOBAL innodb_file_format_max=Barracuda,and you should restart mysql to make it ! i choose upgrade mysql to solve this problem!

yeah, upgrade mysql is an easy way to solve the problem
the issue is the same as #3258
sorry，misoperation.

The 1.3.2 version does not create to worker groups in web page, and the worker group is read from zk. you can refer to issue #3628
Please clear browser cache and refresh this page to check that you should not see the create worker group button.

At present, only a new instance page of the alarm plug-in is added. The fields in the list are copied from other pages. The back end can be coordinated and adjusted in the return field.

> @AhahaGe 第一次部署登录页面怎么都出不来如上面的图那样，用swagger 测试下就是成功的，第一次登入要去检测 sessionid，空的就无法登陆？我用API 的测试了下生成了sessionid，才能正常的登陆。现在是第一次为什么出不来需要不知道怎么定位问题。

i still login success but can't go to manage page,api log show me login success,and session generate and save in db success both,every login completed i should clear browser Local storage,Session storage,Cookies manually to go to manage page, so i think there has a problem!

Please check whether the hive jar version referenced by ds is consistent with the hive server version, and whether there are fewer jars. If you are not sure, you can copy all the hive server hive-*.jar to the ds lib directory.

---

已解决，是因为部署dolphinscheduler的环境是ubuntu18.04
系统默认使用dash，而不是bash
需要修改dash 为bash 

sudo ln -sf /bin/bash /bin/sh
ls -l /bin/sh 检查修改之后的环境状态

I think this should be a network jitter problem . but from NettyRemotingClient.createChannel . I thik can modify  channelFuture.awaitUninterruptibly(this.nettyClientConfig.getConnectTimeoutMillis())

我觉得这应该是网络抖动的问题 .  NettyRemotingClient.createChannel 中的future.sync() 可以修改为  channelFuture.awaitUninterruptibly(this.nettyClientConfig.getConnectTimeoutMillis())

is this entire log for api server ？
部分
在ds中添加了一个20分钟运行一次的调度任务维持master到worker的通信，平稳运行一晚上了，不会再超时，感觉加个心跳机制完全可以解决。另外要说一下，worker节点执行完任务没有删除工作目录，删除目录的方法在master？这也是一个大问题！

> Yes, the timer should continue the last scheduler time status.

You can set the time rule by yourself. The default time rule is to execute every second. You can set it to every minute, every hour, every week, every month..., the first few days of the month are fine.

> > > 定时器模块-定时调度时每7秒|每7分钟|每2天这种定时，不能够跨分钟，跨小时，跨月
> > > 定时调度中

我尝试使用dolphinscheduler框架现在实现的cron表达式无法实现状态的继续，您知道怎么利用现在的机制去实现我上边的描述吗？

sql query is query result data, which can be viewed by sending emails. What is your requirement here is to use sql query function. sql query is to query data for viewing. You can select non-query and perform operations such as sql insert update delete.

---
sql 查询是查询结果数据，通过邮件发送进行查看，您这边是用sql查询功能来实现什么需求。sql 查询是为了查询数据进行查看，可以选择非查询，进行sql insert update delete 等操作。

> 我尝试使用dolphinscheduler框架现在实现的cron表达式无法实现状态的继续，您知道怎么利用现在的机制去实现我上边的描述吗？
The logic of cron is that if it exceeds 60, it will be reset. At the beginning of the time you set, every 59 will cause the next execution to exceed 60. You can set it to execute every 2 minutes. Starting from 30 minutes, you probably know cron Logic
cron的逻辑是如果超过60就会重置，下个周期从你设置的时间的开始，每隔59都会导致下次执行超过60，你可以设置每隔2分钟执行，从30分钟开始，你就大概知道cron的逻辑
